sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pi_topcomp (target_id,regdate,rrn,rrn_pre,foreigner,foreigner_pre,driver,driver_pre,passport,passport_pre,account_num,account_num_pre,card_num,card_num_pre,total,total_pre,total_gap) VALUES (#target_id#,DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'),#rrn#,#rrn_pre#,#foreigner#,#foreigner_pre#,#driver#,#driver_pre#,#passport#,#passport_pre#,#account_num#,#account_num_pre#,#card_num#,#card_num_pre#,#total#,#total_pre#,#total_gap#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE rrn=#rrn#, rrn_pre=#rrn_pre#, foreigner=#foreigner#, foreigner_pre=#foreigner_pre#, driver=#driver#, driver_pre=#driver_pre#, passport=#passport#, passport_pre=#passport_pre#, account_num=#account_num#, account_num_pre=#account_num_pre#, card_num=#card_num#, card_num_pre=#card_num_pre#, total=#total#, total_pre=#total_pre#, total_gap=#total_gap#, regdate=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d')
UPDATE pi_find SET deldate= NOW() WHERE group_id=#group_id# AND target_id=#target_id# AND hash_id=#hash_id#
